useCase.name: Import Json File and Create Warehouse Structure

mainSequence.step: Warehouse Employee imports a Json File.
JsonImporterUI creates the user interface.
JsonImporterUI asks for user information.
Warehouse Employee provides the filename.
JsonImporterUI displays the filename input field.
JsonImporterController creates an instance.
JsonImporterController calls jsonImporter method with the filename.
JsonImporter creates an instance.
JsonImporter calls importer method with the filename.
JsonImporter parses the JSON file to create a warehouse structure.
WarehouseBuilder creates a warehouse instance.
WarehouseBuilder creates a new warehouse structure.
JsonImporter assigns the warehouse structure to the JsonImporter object.
WarehouseRepository saves the warehouse structure.
AisleBuilder creates an aisle instance.
AisleBuilder creates a new aisle structure.
JsonImporter assigns the aisle structure to the JsonImporter object.
AisleRepository saves the aisle structure.
RowBuilder creates a section instance.
RowBuilder creates a new section structure.
JsonImporter assigns the section structure to the JsonImporter object.
SectionRepository saves the section structure.
ShelfBuilder creates a shelf instance.
ShelfBuilder creates a new shelf structure.
JsonImporter assigns the shelf structure to the JsonImporter object.
ShelfRepository saves the shelf structure.
AGVDockBuilder creates an AGV dock instance.
AGVDockBuilder creates a new AGV dock structure.
JsonImporter assigns the AGV dock structure to the JsonImporter object.
AGVDockRepository saves the AGV dock structure.
JsonImporter completes the creation of the warehouse structure.
JsonImporterUI displays user information.
